amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-51 to clarify that existing association health plans may continue to operate under existing state and federal law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Herrera Beutler amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) without objection.
Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Herrera Beutler.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Herrera Beutler.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Herrera Beutler amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Herrera Beutler amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
